articles.title: Jim Irsay, Indianapolis Colts owner, dies at 65 - CBS News
articles.description: Jim Irsay, the owner and CEO of the Indianapolis Colts, died Wednesday at the age of 65, the team said in a statement.
articles.content:
Jim Irsay, the owner and CEO of the Indianapolis Colts, died on Wednesday, the team said in a statement. He was 65.
